lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome to Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons! I got Liam back via Skype, somehow after many episodes of him fucking with me. I'm happy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Payback's a bitch, huh, buddy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably next 30 minutes or so. In the meantime, let's go ahead and hop into our announcements for the evening.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Returning tonight, we have our fantastic sponsor, Loot Crate!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Loot Crate!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Loot Crate, thank you so much for being an awesome sponsor. We've got Loot Crates here. We're going to go ahead and do a quick unboxing and then, Sam, you can tell us a little bit about it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: After the unboxing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure! This is the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A Predator bottle opener!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a little Logan!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty awesome little-- it's a heavy one! It looks like a die-cast, an actual metal, die-cast Wolverine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My son is going to love it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is actually, for the size of Wolverine, this is actually weight-effective. It's accurate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What theme is this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Primal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Primal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Primal. Hey, look! This looks an awful lot like the shirt that Travis is wearing right now!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got mine early, bitches!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look at that! Crispin's been smeared all over Taliesin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that a Winston shirt?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's pretty rad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a Winston shirt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Winston.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love the raptor electrified fence.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is so going on our--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like, our backyard fence.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! The chicken coop!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is going on my chicken coop, man!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On your chicken coop! That's so cute!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You saw this already?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you have a motorcycle, this should go on there so you can ride with raptors through the forest. That's the way to do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a really good box! The bottle opener's really cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bottle opener's cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Predator helmet? Yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a Predator bottle opener.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My brother was singing the praises of this box this week.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, man. This is a good box!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a Primal pin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, no! Does it do--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it turn into a raptor?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It turns into a dinosaur! The box turns into a dinosaur.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like all good boxes should.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to see if I can do this really, really quickly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is this? There's a secret, hidden puzzle thing. The pages are blank and it says "follow "your instinct". What could it be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it scratch and sniff?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm intrigued!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it scratch and sniff?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is definitely not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Follow your instinct: lootcrate.com.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tell us about Loot Crate, Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sam? Oh, Sam's not here.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MATT
lines.text: Oh, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, I think you mean--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You humans must begin the peaceful transition by visiting primitive webpage lootcrate.com/criticalrole. And use promo code CRITICALROLE for 10% off this month's crate theme, Investigate. Items from Stranger Things, Batman, The X-Files, and Marvel's Jessica Jones. That include a figure, detective must-haves, and our awesome monthly tee and pin. I must return to my timeline. Until we meet in the future, good crate, and may the loot be with you! Bleep! Blop! Blorp! Bleep! Blop!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes! Yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, what, did I miss something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just missed him!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sam, when did you get here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You blacked out, man; there was a time traveler in this space!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was crazy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I am a little disappointed you decided to reveal your character for the next campaign so early.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So you're going to do a Loot Crate ad, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was so-- That was new.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you very much, Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: New character.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And thank you, Loot Crate, for sponsoring this chaos. All right, let's get this going. We put up a survey starting this week to try and get a feel for the community at large of you guys. Get a feel for who's watching, where they're watching it from, what kind of future merch ideas you might want to see from the show. We want to get a scope of what the Critter base is, where it comes from, and how many of you are out there. So, if you get a chance, if you haven't yet, go to geekandsundry.com/crsurvey. We're running it until April 18th, so get on there and let us know about you!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's pretty short and you can do it during the break, maybe?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did it in a minute.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it's pretty short, pretty easy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: WonderCon is in two days, for us! It's this weekend in Anaheim; we're going to be there Saturday, at 2PM to 3PM at The Arena to do our Talks Machina live panel, with a bunch of us up there. With delivery coffee for Taliesin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get! You're in the shot, you're in the shot! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Eric.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you Eric! Loot Crate!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So if you're coming, go ahead and check it out. If you can't be there, that's okay, I think we're filming the panel, I think.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it'll get put up at a later time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is going to be aired during Talks Machina this week, in place of our normal show, so if you miss it, you get to see the full panel in its entirety.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, we look forward to seeing you guys there in a couple of days, so yay! Wednesday Club, Taliesin!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we don't actually have a-- that happened. We don't actually have a subject yet, we're going through and taking suggestions from Twitter and from the chatroom, but we will have that probably figured out, I'm going to guess tomorrow and probably a graphic on Monday, but Wednesday 12 to 2, we're talking comics, and it's going to be fun, so we'll just-- come and join us and we'll chill.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (accent) Talking comics.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (accent) Talking comics.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (accent) Talking comics.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you get a chance to check it out, I recommend it, I'm on a couple of them. Signal Boost has a ringtone if I recall, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We released a ringtone (laughs).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As well as--?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As well as-- so you can now get our theme song as your ringtone on iTunes. We also released a free screensaver, that you can download, based off of the old flying toasters.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The After Dark, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: After Dark, yeah, flying toasters.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're still waiting for the WinAmp--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The WinAmp skin was cancelled, but we're working on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Working on that one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But yeah, we-- just because we thought it was funny. That's how we choose to spend our free time, is releasing free screensavers, yeah, so go do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Me, Marisha and Taliesin actually were just announced for MomoCon this year, May 25th to the 28th, in Atlanta, Georgia. So, if you guys over in the Georgia area are willing to make the journey, we'll be there at MomoCon, doing panels and signings and all kinds of fun, general hangout stuff, so come see us there. And last but not least, reminder, Talks Machina is Tuesday nights at 7PM Pacific here, where our wonderful Brian Wayne Foster brings us in in chunks, with occasional members of the community to talk all things nerdy and Critical Role-related, so come check it out on Twitch, or Alpha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) He brings us in chunks, that was phenomenally worded.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He brings us in chunks!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Murderous.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Very murderous.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very Dexter of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I like to leave it vague, open to interpretation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Very shark-chummy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Woo, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I have one last announcement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shit, no! Liam! All right, what is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you are alone--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She'll talk her way out of it, like she always does! (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll have a panic attack is what (clears throat) I want to do. All right. Fuck me. Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a good way to start.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can't-- Getting cotton mouth. And, (laughs) And I'm going to slowly start from the top down, transforming-- forming--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, wow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shut up, Sam!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Via, what are-- what are you using? What are you using?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) This is rough already!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you using Alter Self?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I want to use Shapechange.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're casting Shapechange?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. Right? Because I can't Alter Self into an erinyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you cannot. But however, you did not quite cast Shapechange last time--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- we had spoken. So you're doing it now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I'm doing it now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So. As they both begin to slowly flank from the sides of the alleyway, and you're holding your ground, insisting that this 'white one' they're asking about belongs to you, they didn't seem to buy your attempt at claiming territory, so you begin to mutter the incantation beneath your breath, your hands move, and you watch as you do so, the chains of the chain devil begin to-- continue to grind and shift around it, like a hundred serpents of grinding metal, and the dwarf figure, she begins sauntering up on the other side with this heavy limp, as you watch the flesh tearing with small tendrils revealing beneath, like a series of worms are almost emerging from various folds and gashes in the flesh of the arm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ugh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You complete your Shapechange spell as they're pulling in on you: what do you turn into?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: An erinyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh sh-- okay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was that? What was that? What's that do? What's an erinyes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's that thing that we fought in the City of Brass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh! Cool!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they have Challenge Level 12, so you can do that. Okay. So.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There was like the devil that we fought--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lady demon with Pit Fiend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the one that the Pit Fiend summoned next to it. So you have actually encountered it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That winged biatch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, the one that you squared up against with, for most of the time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, she didn't want none.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you finish the incantation, your skin goes to a pale white, your eyes becoming dark, deep red with these little burning, golden coals for pupils. The rest of your skin grows fair but thick, with a very, very fine series of scales across it as these giant black, red wings emerge from your back and unfold. As they extend past you in both directions, enveloping both sides of this alleyway, both the chain devil and the dwarfish entity stop in their tracks and take a couple of steps back, looking at you intensely.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do they call the two of you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check. With advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, that's good! That's a good plan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Advantage? Do it, do it, do it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you are, you look like a higher ranking devil.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got this. In the City of Dis.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You got Dis!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You got Dis.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I think my intimidation's an eight-- No, it's a seven. So-- 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) 25.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you asked for their name, the chain devil-- the chains begin to slow and come to a halt, and what was originally curling upward in this aggressive stance begin to just fall limp to its sides, and just takes another step back. "No need to worry, we apologize for the intrusion."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you sure? Because I would love to know, maybe add you to the collection.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The chain devil bows its head and begins to step back, and you see it ushering its hand this way, towards the dwarf, the dwarf which is looking confused and begins to hobble backward. And they both just back out of the alleyway in a very submissive, apologetic physicality, without even saying a word.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, what's the matter! Where're you going?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just let 'em, just let 'em go!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I turn around, and I (strained) just start walking cool--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can fly!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whimpers) Yeah, I can fly! That's also, this is a concentration spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes it is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, I can't do-- Okay, so I'm going to, as I-- Is anyone looking around? Anyone looking around right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: God damn it. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22. You glance up, and right on the edge of one of the three- to four-story curved iron towers, you see what appears to be an impish-like creature perched on the end with what looks to be faint, shimmering gold armor that's just peering down at you from the top of the alley.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look at it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I just nod.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't react. Its head twitches a little bit, and it just sets back in itself, looking at you, its eyes these gleaming black, shining discs in the darkness.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I start heading back towards the tavern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It just watches you. And as you exit the alleyway from where you came, the two devils that attempted to assail you there, no longer anywhere in sight, the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Before I round the corner, I want to just take and do a quick Shapechange again into the tiefling that I was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As your form changes as you turn the corner--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Into the tavern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- into the tavern. Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go upstairs to the rest of the group.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you pee on yourself?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (panicked gasping) Okay! Okay!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What? What happened? How'd it go?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't make it far! I didn't make it far.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You ate the meat, didn't you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Woo!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, how far are we talking about?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I made it around the corner, and the two devils that seemed to be very interested in you, Vax, cornered me-- (nervous laugh)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In me? Why?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a feeling it has something to do with your deity.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? Your deity? Why?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think they can tell that Vax is special. I think-- He has value down here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have value?! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's the first I'm hearing about it, trust me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They said they were interested in 'the white one.' And I couldn't help but notice that you were turning quite a few heads when we were walking through town.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, do you think that's because of the Raven Queen? Or is it because of the choice of appearance I picked? I mean, we've met an albino tiefling before, it didn't seem like that outlandish a choice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think it has anything to do with the way you looked.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not entirely sure. I mean, they didn't react-- Did they react strangely to you when we came into the bar?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not that I noticed, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So does that mean that he has to change again now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think it matters what he turns into, I think people will be able to tell the aura that he carries with him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: -- like, he changes, and then we know what it is or not, what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that's actually very impressive, it is actually a process of divination, technically, that's just very--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Some sound reasoning.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Somehow you wandered right back to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't lose your wits down here, it's real important.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is just an extra wrinkle into a larger problem. So, what's the move now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I can do this for about another 55 minutes! Before we'd have to sleep before I can do it again!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we have to go anywhere? Are we late to any appointments?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I forgot what it was you left to go do, actually! (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She was going to research the notion of other options other than dealing with the deal we have downstairs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to go see if I could get a bead on where Hotis is. Oh! What, guys, check this out, this is what I freaked 'em out with. And I go back into the erinyes form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch the wings (whoosh) unfurl, her skin going pale--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (deeper voice) Check it out. Check it out, that's pretty hot, right? It makes my--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is amazing!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- it makes my voice a little smokey when I'm down here too, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa! Whoa!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you right now?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm an erinyes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do you spell that?! Doty, take that down! Erinyes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do you say it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's with an 'e'.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: E-R-I-N-Y-E-S.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ear-in-es.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Air-in-es.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Erin. Like Erin-yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's got yes-bait right in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well. Do you still want to look into other options, or do we want to just-- We could take the deal. We could reverse the deal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, you said they like left you alone once you changed into that thing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, why didn't you just keep going, then?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, changing into this thing meant that I had to drop concentration on my Locate Creature spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ohh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can only concentrate on one thing at a time. It gets-- Especially this, it's a lot to mentally focus on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's very impressive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, in my readings of this place, the Hells-- Of any hell, really (laughs)-- They typically are, at least in literature, reflected as horrible places where lots of bad things happen wherever you go. So having a deal presented in front of us that is not horrible is, I think, a pretty winning deal. I mean, I feel like we're already ahead of the game if we are not being actively murdered during the course of events.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would also like to point out that the definition of 'research', in this instance, is just reading the notes that I took last week, reading and doing actual research.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do my own reading, thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You did! You did reading of the notes I wrote.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, then I guess we're in accord. (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, don't you, like, brainy buddies just like exchange notes every day, anyway?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't feel like I should have lost that one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I noticed--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just let it go, Percy. I noticed we're being watched, I think at every turn. There was a little imp guy watching me when I came in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Was it actually an imp? Imps are very common. Everyone's being watched, it's a city under surveillance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We saw an imp back in Krieg's house, did it look like that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Gold armor? Or wasn't that the one at Krieg's house?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It did not have gold armor, the one that you saw at Krieg's.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which one did we see? Was it just-- I don't--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The little bastard in the library at Krieg's house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, that was in Krieg's-- Technically it wasn't in Krieg's house--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was in father, what's the character's--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was upstairs in the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it was the first-- when you first came to Emon, it was the ally to your father, Vax.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that's right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, shit, that's right, your dad!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he was the one that was found slain, or was in the process of being killed by--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's right, that's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- by entities.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In the basement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, that was a long time ago!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A long time ago.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The slaying, right. The slaying was in the basement, but the imp was in a library upstairs--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes! Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- in our house. And he was just a little prick.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I forgot about that. I kept a ring off that demon that we killed. It's in the bag of holding.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, did you really?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's like seven haircuts ago.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, get that--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whip it out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get that-- can I-- Get that out. Get that out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why, what do you want?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Might be useful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll trade you something for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My glasses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your-- (laughs) (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You! You! I'm not going to fall for that!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was worth-- the joke was worth the ring alone, I would imagine. We were going to give it back, we just want to see it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So that big demon, that like body slammed me on that spike? Piece of shit. I took this ring off of his finger, forever ago. And I kept it. I take it out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's have a look! I'll cast Identify on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a symbol on it-- Roll a religion check, actually.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I aid with a history or religion as well?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sorry, that's from like, three years ago.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I help with him with that? History or religion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be religion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's one of the oldest things in this bag.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's only one other thing that's older.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: An 11 on top of that, so--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's the one thing that's older?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's an onyx statue that we found down in the cell that you were in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That he was in, yeah. So, the two of you both conjecturing about it, the symbol here is one that you picked up specifically in the tome you did research earlier. It is the symbol of Asmodeus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is the symbol of Asmodeus, I would have instantly recognized it, at this point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Asmodeus. I was going to say that as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You, of course you were going to say Asmodeus, because it's like written six times in my notes, and I'm literally staring at a sketch of it in my notes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Asmo-day-us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like we're sympatico on this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we use it? Is it something that'll get us like, a backstage pass to an audience of some kind?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a long look at this thing. Is this some sort of mark of-- Is this a marker? Some sort of favor marker? Is this a signet of stature? Is this a-- You don't just put this on anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's mine, don't forget.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems, from best you can tell-- Make an intelligence check, actually.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I should probably assist.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, me too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yes please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We got two natural ones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a nose ring!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think it's a, uh. A contact lens!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs) For tiny napkins.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as you guys know, it looks pretty damn important. That's the only thing you can ascertain.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me, let me see if I can get something out of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine, I don't care.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I scry on it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scry?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like scry and see if it shows me something?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh! Object scry?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me see.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that-- a thing I-- no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, if you focus on an item, you can use that item to try an improve a scrying attempt if you're looking for a specific individual or location.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Individual.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But I don't think the Scrying spell directly allows you to, to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is a spell that does that, though-- Object History.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we don't have that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't have that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you're curious, the person it belonged to is dead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We killed him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The symbol on this object, though, is more or less the ruler of this dimension, so it could be useful for something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we keep it handy, no pun intended, and we'll just flash it if we get in trouble, and see if that helps us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How is that a pun?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was actually thinking the same thing, I don't understand how that was--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a ring. I said handy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a stretch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sorry to say.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: not?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we doing it on our own?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, this imp that I saw did have sparkly gold armor, he may be like an important imp. I'm just saying, I feel like everyone's here wanting to make a deal. It might be good to talk to others.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vex, you're being awfully quiet, what do you think we should do right now? (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) Yeah, Vex!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, at this point, is watching the whole thing, and she goes, "Well, to be perfectly "honest, I haven't heard much detail about this deal that you apparently seemed to make. What do "we make of the deal?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The owner of this establishment we're staying in works for a man he doesn't like. Is curious what would happen if he wasn't working for that man, if he was suddenly, for reasons, unavailable. And for that, we would probably be arrested, if we dealt with it inappropriately, and we would be in a position to be-- make our enemy accessible, I suppose. We have to be a bit cagey, there are ears, apparently, everywhere. Even here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like we don't need to make a deal to go murder someone to get arrested. I feel like I could just go streaking in the street and just say words, and we would get arrested.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As, actually--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Strangely, excited by that plan as I am--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why do we need to commit this crime, and then suffer the apt consequences?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but Keyleth, once we're arrested, he's supposed to, like, shuffle us in, y'know, on the low-low, into--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can he get us out?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, where we need to be, yeah. Out never came up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Out never came up?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're our out. We leave all of this behind once all that's taken care of.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then why do we need him as our in?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because we have no other plan at this point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At this point we have no other plan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You were supposed to go find something, (singsong) but you got followed by demons.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I did. Yes, I did. I could do-- attempt something similar. Potentially with a higher-level version of my Locate Creature spell--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- which is Find the Path, which could get us close. Potentially.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if the guy he wants us to kill is like a real piece of shit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're all pieces of shit!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everything down here is a piece of shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does anybody have a problem with that? It's just like, y'know, piece of shit: (killing noise), and he's gone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The only problem I have with it--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, Tary.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: -- and the only reason I'm even being vaguely hesitant about any of this is because they're all pieces of shit, including the one that we're making any sort of bargain with.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And they are professional bargainers, and I know we're missing something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We kill him, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a Lawful Evil dimension. If he wants his boss dead, that means that there's going to be someone else above him. If we kill one guy, who's all going to want to kill us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did he ask, like, a decision by a certain time?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't recall-- So, I said I would have it within a day or so, if I recall--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you said 'fairly promptly.'

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, fuck, we've got a day! Let's go explore, see what we can find.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And if we're going to decide to trust him, we could also show him the ring and see what he makes of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not the ring! God, not the ring-- I mean, I, fuck, I totally forgot about that ring until now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's literally still holding it in his hand in front of your face, you just--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I need it back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What will you do with it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to wear it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Does it fit on any of me giant, Oscar Meyer fingers? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It fits partway down your pinkie, but it gets caught on, like, the first knuckle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, look at you! Oh my gosh! Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like he went to Claire's.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Property of Asmodeus! Ass-modeus--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This never ends well. Let's forego disguises.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, wait, you ready to go?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to just drain ourselves the more we pretend to be something we're not, and obviously it's not helping us not attract attention.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vax, you got any problem with that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, I don't know what the deal is with the people who are interested in me. I can't tell if one's better or worse. But we're just going to go waltz out into town and see what happens, is that the idea?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we could-- Keyleth could keep her wings and armor, and they'd be probably, possibly, less likely to question any of us if we're walking around with someone of reasonable stature.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I might remind you: for 50 minutes, now, at this point now, right? So then we're all dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, then we're all dead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we just-- It's like curfew. We have to be home in about 50 minutes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about you? Do you have like a magic jock strap you can rip off and change into something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've already done that. We're all tieflings because of me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not me, bitch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're-- abnormal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kiki, the prison that you saw, did you get an idea for how big it is?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The what? The prison?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The prison. That we need to break into or get arrested and pulled into--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't see how big. It seemed immense, and like it was probably pretty big underground? But I couldn't-- can't be for sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would say it would be safe to assume that a prison in hell would be so big that there would be sayings such as 'as big as filling-- try attempting to fill a prison in hell.' I feel like this is just-- I think we're like walking into idioms, at this point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But if this gentleman, if I may call him a gentleman, can escort us to the right cell block, or whatever, that might be very, very handy. I don't want to spend any more time in hell than we have to, and as much as I usually hate employees revolting against their employer, I feel like we've got a bird in the hand, so to speak, and we should strike while the iron is hot, if I can use many, many cliches all at once.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait for it, wait for it.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's going on?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was listening in the car!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're about to Say Yes to the Dress, and go and follow this plan, I think.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was the one? It was the one?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, do you want to take the contract? And we go kill (burps) big shit guy and go to prison? Or do we try and, like, take a day and see what we can find on our own, without giving ourselves over to this-- arrangement?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) I don't want to walk around this place!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (South African accent) We're going to kill the big guy. Oh god! I'm in South African.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you are. Vax.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah! (babbling)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's your vote?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, well, hold on, I've got one more spitball idea. Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (accent still off) Yeah! Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That gate stone that we've used so many times, does that only work on the material plane? Does it work--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, here's the thing, darling. I gave the other gate stone to Scanlan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It won't get us out of here, no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't have one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would it take us off this plane, though, or no?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, it would take one person off this plane.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would only take one person, and they have to be on the same plane of existence.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, no, it wouldn't take anyone anywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would know that. Based on the enchantment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So that's a dead end. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Also, I heard you guys talking about the guys with the gold armor?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While you were standing two feet away?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While I was standing right here, I heard you guys talking about it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And those guys, they're guards of the city! Those imps in the gold armor, we were warned about those guys!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We were?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, why didn't you chime in before?! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, fucking speak up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I wanted to! But I was biting my nails really hard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, we have a day or so. Does anyone else think that we should maybe not take the first deal that presents itself in the first tavern that we step into in the city? Does that not seem super convenient?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, what are our chances of walking around town and going like, 'hey, that prison, 'right? Right over--'?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean-- (transforming sound) (deeper voice) We've got about 50 minutes, if we still want to go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, also, if we want to get, y'know, pinched and put into this prison, what are the chances that we-- if we start shit here, are we just going to get killed in the streets? Or dragged off? It doesn't seem very solid to me, but I don't have any other idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, time for a vote!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I agree.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tary, what's your vote?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I say we take this deal, kill that employer, and go to prison. Oh my god--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jeez, Tary, you've gone straight gangsta in so little time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I just want to get the fuck out of here and go back home so I can enjoy some wine!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy, what's your vote?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I vote we take the deal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keyleth!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think an extra day of walking around this city could potentially save us years in hell that--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't need an explanation, jesus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we take the deal at sundown.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Vax?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We don't take the deal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, I really don't see the harm in spending another day here and getting the lay of the land.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I vote for-- For another day here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But if we don't find any leads, we take it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I vote for taking the contract! Me and Tary, we're of a like mind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I was just swinging. I swing back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? You swing back?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I said I'd take the day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He said he wants the day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bullshit. All right, we take the day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, Doty hasn't voted yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Neither has Trinket.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What, is Doty the center that breaks the tie?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe they should arm wrestle for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe they should.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Giant grizzly bear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Arm wrestle that bear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turns towards you and Trinket goes-- (bear grunting)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket, you can do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Saunters up and looks up at Doty-- (bear sniffing, snorts) Fogs up the metal for a second on the outside--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, I haven't chosen my dice yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Choose your dice. (chuckles)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (snorts) Give her 35 minutes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just hold on, I just need like a few--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just pick one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She needs a bucket of Vaseline, a feather, preferably from a dove, and 35-40 minutes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Why's all my stuff in different order?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so the-- it takes roughly five or so minutes to try and bring one of the nearby tables over without burning the shit out of your palms--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- that could possibly facilitate an arm wrestling match between a giant metal man and a grizzly bear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh-- but, wait wait wait wait. Doty's not going to get any advantage on this because he's been leaning against a door, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's cooled off by now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as it's all there, the giant metal man, Trinket comes up--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) Where's my Doty stats--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Put your whole body into it, Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Trinket, not really-- Trinket doesn't grasp, Trinket just goes-- and just does like a claw strike at his, at his hand--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- because that's what a bear does. And so the giant open palm of the automaton gets slammed by the strength of Trinket's claw and this is going to be the, one way or another, the fastest arm wrestling match you've ever seen. I need you to go ahead and roll a d20 and add Trinket's strength modifier.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on, Trinket.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Either way, I'm entertained. Nothing but winners.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d20 and add Doty's strength modifier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ping! The bear's claw goes full swing, Doty's arm gets thrust back and almost seems to pop out of the socket briefly--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Son of a bitch!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- before pops it back in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I must wage a complaint. That was not a regulation arm-wrestling match, they did not have elbows down--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not a fair match, he doesn't have arm joints.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not my fault that you didn't design your robot-bear to have arm joints.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's a real bear. He's a real bear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I haven't seen any evidence of that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket, go pee on him. Go potty, right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Please don't, I rust in many places.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And this very large, looming bear just-- (aggressive bear grunting)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- looms up towards you. Do you do anything?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm scared of the bear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the feeling of ever-so-slowly trickling, warm urine soaks the right side of your armored leg, Trinket's nose slowly brushes up against the side of your ear and face and goes (sniffing, grunting) (slurp) licks the side of your head and then the last little bits of trickle end as Trinket turns around and lumbers back towards Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How's that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did that seem real enough?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, by the way, there's now a (sizzling) it's starting to actually--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that smells really awful, I'm sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have to make a point in the room we're sleeping in?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry, I'm sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is really nice now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, this is Grog's room anyway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we're going to go outside and take a look around, I think now is the time to do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. Let's go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we want to show our friend downstairs our ring?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, we can show him later.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to abandon that--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How's that going for you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eject! Eject!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) Speaking in tongues.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, she's gone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's been a long week.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want to what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They would never believe it if you told them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want me to be the erinyes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you feel it start to fade we'll find some cover and let you--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do my thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: -- do your thing. I don't think, I don't think that anybody here is necessarily against duplicity, I just think they're against duplicity against them, whomever they serve.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, but can you be the erinyes and locate-- thing at the same time?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, but I can, I can, oh wait, I can cast Locate Object, but not people. Does it work the same way? Would a Hotis egg-ball be an object?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, that is specifically a creature.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would a prison be an object?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mmm, no, it's a location.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about the prison door outside of Hotis' room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't seen it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure, I got 30 minutes left of this 9th-level spell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll pop it over-- pop it out if we need.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, what if somebody comes up to you and like, thinks you're somebody and you're not, and then you gotta, like, talk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, she's her own person. It's not like she looks like any other one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look like-- I currently look like that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A 1984 metal magazine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, she's full Mystique, she can pretty much do it all at this point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true, I can do it all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, what's the form you're taking?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's right, I'll just take my regular tiefling form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys gather your things--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But the rest of us are normal, right? Because we don't have Alter Self anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So if anyone asks, we belong to her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For 30 minutes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, fine. 30. Very expensive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So, as you guys make your way down into the main chamber, there's one more devilish entity that's in the process of feasting on what looks to be a small cauldron of some sort of broken bone and dark purple and bluish flesh, and it's just tearing into it, as Ipkesh is at the same table where you guys previously spoke with him. He's sitting there with his same glass of wine, and as you approach, he gives a nod towards you, and he has a piece of paper on the table.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is this just to peruse?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He slides it forward. "Have a read. See if it's up to your preferences."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: May I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will give you the piece of paper, actually.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, let's mime it! (grunts) Coming!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was really enjoying miming reading.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god, it's so long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) It's a contract!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god! How are we-- C'mon, really?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Super long!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll be fine, I can do this. Really? Okay, no. Okay, well, carry on, let's walk about while we do this. I will read out important things-- Oh, I can't walk with this, can I? I have to leave this on the table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. You have to leave this here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just give me page two!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want me to give it a look?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, fuck, it's long.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you catch it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Buzz.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He already signed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I roll my dice while they're reading a contract?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (resigned) Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No-- No-- No-- Nope!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can actually faff all of this. You are an evil person.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like the CPA mini-game of Vox Machina!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just want to update my iPhone, jesus!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of, yeah. Would you like me to read the contract out loud?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's so long, Matt!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's so fucking long. It's got to be at-- there's like--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can-- well, you read too much out loud. We will read it out loud.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Taliesin, take it away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. "This contract binds the scribe and recipient into a deal--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold on a second.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "-- of chosen escalation for an unending period of time, or this contract is voided by an "agreement on the part of both parties. Upon agreeing to and signing this contract, the "recipient is bound to their agreed obligations and parameters within the first pact, as is the "scribe. Upon completion of the agreed obligations and parameters on both sides of the initial pact, "the first pact is considered complete and concluded."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is awful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Any violation of this contract on the part of the "recipient immediately locks the claim and ownership of the everlasting soul of the "recipient, invoking the laws of this pact primeval, under the control and dominance of the scribe for "all eternity, sending the soul of the recipient immediately upon death to the scribe to do with as "they see fit. First Pact: the scribe" --your name here, Ipkesh--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's definitely like an iPhone contract.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "-- agrees to enable safe passage into the depths of Mentiri, specifically the Bastion of "Flesh, unharmed." Bastion of Flesh. "The recipient-- your name here-- agrees to be the "instrument of assassination leading to the death of-- Utugash" -- or should-- a name I will not say out loud-- "the Herald of" --something I will not say out loud-- "with the revealing or leaving "of evidence that could connect or incriminate the scribe in an act or reasons for the act."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Second Pact! (robot voice) The scribe, Ipkesh, agrees to--"

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) (normal voice) Okay. "The scribe, Ipkesh, agrees to immediately conjure forth a "cadre of devils in service to the recipient--" That's us. "-- whom shall remain under the command "of and dedicated to the protection of the recipient for the duration of one month!" We get a cadre of devils. "The cadre shall include four hamantula and a single osyluth. Should any devils "bound within this agreed-upon cadre be slain outside of Baator, they are absolved of future "service to the recipient. The recipient, our name here, agrees to introduction and installation of "at least two chosen of Dispater, who have been selected by the scribe, within a place of divine "worship of the scribe's choice. The recipient must not interfere with this installation upon "completion, and any interference will be considered a violation of contract. Third pact!" (big inhale) "The scribe, Ipkesh, agrees to immediately impart the recipient with knowledge of "ancient power beyond their grasp, enabling the use of divine powers granted under the grace of Lord "Dispater that can instantly restore themselves or allies to a healthy state--" Ooh, we get health knowledge! "-- or rend the lifeforce from their opponents!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: At what cost?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's giving us magic!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: At what cost?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "These powers remain within your possession until death! The recipient--" that's us, "-- agrees to immediately lock the claim and ownership of the everlasting soul of the recipient, invoking "the laws of the pact primeval, under the control and dominance of the scribe for all eternity, "sending the soul of the recipient immediately upon death to the scribe to do with as they see fit."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're selling our soul!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not necessarily.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My favorite line: "This contract as a whole remains until the predetermined period of "eternity." That's my favorite!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In theory, only one person has to accept the contract.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To lock this in, you only agree to the first pact. And when the first pact is complete, you do not have to trigger any of the other pacts. The contract remains in effect. Should you ever decide to trigger the pact, it immediately comes into play.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So, second pact is: we get a bunch of devils, and they get to install two in a place of divine worship to be determined. Third pact is: we get all sorts of devil magic in exchange for our souls.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we're probably not going to do those pacts-- (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just don't do those ones.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, like, we went in to buy a car, and he's also offering us a condo and land in Florida, at the same time, is that about it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you don't have to accept--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In perpetuity, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, in perpetuity. So, you don't have to decide now on the other pacts, but at some point down the road, if you're ever in a situation where you're like, 'oh shit, we're all about to die, I 'invoke the second pact,' boom, you get a bunch of devils to help you for the next month.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow-- And you just have to, like, say that? You're like, 'Yo, Ipkesh, I take that second pact!'

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You invoke the pact.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So the second pact is, we get a bunch of stuff, but we have to do, what was it, the-- "agrees to introduction and installation of at least two of--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have to take two devils and put them in a place of holy worship somewhere in the world.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. And then the third pact is our soul.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Our soul for somebody else's life.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One of our souls, or all our souls?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One person has to sign the contract and only that person's soul--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that's not so bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And the first pact, the scribe "enables safe passage into the depths of Mentiri, "specifically the Bastion of Flesh, unharmed." I feel like that's a little thin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you're-- And you say this, in character? (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, there is room for negotiation, of course."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we have some time, I could summon my father's army of lawyers--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (chuckles) Do they have a branch here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, (laughs) it would take them quite some time to arrive. But they've negotiated tougher deals than this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was strangely hoping that your father's lawyers had a branch here, that would be--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Appropriate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think they originated here, but then they moved to where I'm from for the tax laws.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to leave it, and we'll be back in the evening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. Please, return when you have a better idea of what you would like to see "adjusted, and I will do the same."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I thank you for your time and patience.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes it and rolls it up, and it vanishes below the table as you exit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) How do we know when it's evening here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Don't whisper here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Sorry. (very loudly) How do we know when it's evening here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't yell here!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know. Can we ask him? How do we know when it's evening here? Does it get dark?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It does not get dark, there is no evening here in Dis."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course! (nervous laughing) Of course.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to get mugged, aren't we? (laughs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm, I mean-- I already got close!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, let's take a look around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does he seem to, like, notice or care that we're not the tieflings anymore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He has taken a scan of the group, but he doesn't seem to be flinching. He is just there and eager to talk some more.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's Vegas, man. He don't give a fuck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think indifference is the common courtesy here to an awful lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you guys exit the establishment into the street, the heated cobblestone still glowing a dull maroon and black, you watch as what looks to be some sort of strange mist-like form emanates from a crack, and turns into a screaming specter that-- (gasping) -- and drifts further down the street, past you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lovely.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Badly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you guys wish to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are we trying to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're just going to walk around and see if we can sense where this bastion of death is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've got 25 minutes before your spell is up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The bastion of death is what we're trying to find.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The bastion of death is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Bastion of Flesh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Bastion of Flesh is who he wants us to kill?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the Bastion of Flesh is-- The safe passage to the Bastion of Flesh, that is what the contract enables you should you fulfill your part of the deal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that's the prison we're looking for.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Mentiri is the prison; that's the part of the prison. Prison has parts.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tell me-- how much time?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 25 minutes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 25 minutes? What can we do in 25 minutes? We could fast-talk a couple of people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could I Locate Object on the Bastion of Flesh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not an object. It's a location.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about snow cones?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just going to keep asking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) You wouldn't be Vex if you didn't.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 25 minutes until your spell is dissipated, but once it is, we can do Locate Person.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Correct. I could also do Find the Path if I have a little piece of the prison. If we could get a little piece of the prison--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. No problem!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We just need a little chunk of prison lock.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If I just had a little piece of the White House, I could just-- (snaps)-- right to it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, there are people who walk away with pieces of forests, beaches, all the time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They get there first, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where do you find those people? Just walking around?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. Does there look like an oddities store?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Were there any last little bit of Hotis grit or funk in my belly button where he shanked me?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I mean--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless you guys have anything in your possession from that battle, then no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You had mentioned that you had a Locate Object spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there any object that this person we're supposed to assassinate has that you have seen and know of?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, this person? No, I don't know anything about--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This Hotis.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hotis. I mean, he had knives, but that's the only thing I remember.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He had a cloak, did he not?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He did have a cloak, but-- I mean, last time we saw him, he was also a-- little, writhing--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did see those knives, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did, but also--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I mean he was just a-- Like a cat baby wrapped in bacon when we saw him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, he had a tiger-skin hoodie.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know if he would still have those items.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He would reform without-- All the material possessions that Hotis had on his body when you killed him were left behind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does there look like there's a weird oddities store or dealer or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm also getting in on that. I'm looking for anything of value.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like a costume shop?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20! Hee hee hee--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never mind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't ask around because--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a bad idea, and you start getting the idea, too, whatever's coming down, they get the stink eye, and you just-- turn tough gaze and keep walking. And eventually, you come upon a facility of some kind that looks to be made of almost-- pieces of black and rusted sheet metal that's jammed together in a very patchwork fashion. You don't see a doorway more than you see a triangular opening where the various interlocking pieces of metal aren't fully flush. From the inside, you see a soft reddish-orange glow that flickers ever so gently. As you glance inside, you see a few makeshift braziers that are flickering with reddish-orange fire and what appear to be some gleaming shelves lining up strange, glowing collections.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Going in?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to go in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you guys enter--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hands in your pockets, Tary.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have no pockets.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not Tary. We have to give him a name.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everyone use code names.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Code names?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yrat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yrat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yrat. It's your name backwards, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ow, ow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take three psychic damage--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (yells)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- from attempting to think too hard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's writing it down!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You just got punished for being too witty!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's so sad!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just a bit of blood trickles out of his right ear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the most you thing I have seen happen all game.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like we have to call you Yrat now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yrat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's fine, I've been treated worse than this--earlier today.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you got pissed on by a bear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, that's what I was talking about!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who by the way-- He's back in my necklace by the way. I don't want Trinket walking around here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I assumed you didn't want a giant bear walking around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What are we calling the two of you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wode. You can call me Wode.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wode?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wode.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's somehow worse, all right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I'm Wade

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm never going to-- Wode and Wade?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wode and Wade!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What the shit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What? No Bill and Ted? All right. Wode and Wade. My word!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wode, and Wade, Yrat--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Freddie.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you can call me Minxie.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Minxie.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And this is Greg over here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Greg.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: By the way, our 25 minutes is quickly ticking down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, imagine this is happening quickly, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is happening quickly as we enter the shop. We all enter the shop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And across the way, there is just a stool and what looks to be some sort of humanoid creature that is slumped forward and breathing heavily. With these elongated, dull green color on the skin, a series of small spines that protrude from the shoulders and back--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Spines?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, like jagged, long, thin spines. And as you enter inside, it turns up and goes,

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't have a code name for him!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Freddie.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Freddie, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bidet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You come to buy pretties?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thing is-- I'm looking for something specific.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you seek?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have any pieces or remnants or items from the Mentiri Prison? Specifically from the Bastion of Flesh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, no, I do not go there."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Because it is for fleshy types." And he nudges this long, jagged chin; these gnashing teeth that are crooked and overlapping as it spits as it speaks in your direction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Charming.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where is it located? We need in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I slowly start to Shapechange just for the erinyes face, and I give just a flash of it. We need in. And you're going to help me, aren't you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check with advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking hell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Literally.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking hell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it? What is it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a 19! But it was almost bad!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus seven.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus seven, so 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everything must not be the same as it was. I know "not where it is, I know not where the Bastion is, I'm sorry!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well then, how do people get around the city? You know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Those who work, those who are within, those who are under the guidance of the prison's "masters. They know. They know."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where do I find them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) The ring!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I show them the ring of Asmodeus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't have it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) No, but she does.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. But she doesn't?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He has it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. I dunno who has it. The ring!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's on his pinkie.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He went to Jared!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (high-pitched singing) It can only be Jared!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Jared!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can not help! I don't know." And he just lowers his head in a shameful worrying. You can see his knees are quivering ever-so-gently.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to insight check him to see if he looks like he's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like he is but I just want to make sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 26 there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, legitimately, this creature is pretty pathetic as far as devils go that you've come across, and in the threatening presence of an erinyes that is asking for information it does not seem to have, it is legitimately awaiting a terrible demotion that it doesn't feel it earned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mistress, I don't believe he knows.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I need a name and location of where to find the information that I need.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know, I don't know."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then who does?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see him looking around, spastically, his eyes are shooting around the room at all of you and around looking at the geodes at different directions almost like a weird iguana face. He says, "The torturers, the chains."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: God damn it-- the chain devils. All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, we're in here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
