lines.text: I think we should allow this poor creature an attempt to redeem himself, what is it that you sell here that would please our mistress?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I sell pretties, I sell pretties, pretties used for rites, used for magic"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Please, impress us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He stands up now, and this creature that looked so pathetic when it was squatting down on this stool, these long thin gollum-like legs, it stands up and is now head-height, a good foot over most of the party-- Gangly, the spines extending from the back of the head and the arms and the elbows as it stands up now. As it slowly stalks over to one of the shelves and pulls off one of these strange purple geodes, the various crystals jutting out of different sides, and it turns around and brings it forward. "This, this carries pure condensed soul energy, geodes robbed her from "the fourth layer." As he takes it and holds it in front towards you, you look inside and you swear within the slight glimmers of light that shake through from the nearby braziers you see almost dozens of faces pressed up against the crystalline interior, shifting past, similar to that giant sphere, that orb you saw being passed through the city when you first arrived.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is insulting! Skip the small stuff, what have you got?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is what I have got."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry, I'm sorry." He looks to you and looks back. "Mistress, I'm, I have-- this."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mistress, would you like one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do you have that's unique? Expensive is lovely, don't get us wrong, but we're looking for unique, odd.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I had one of those for breakfast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So proud of you right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It lumbers over to this far corner and there's a pile of what looks like burlap and refuse and partially eaten partially rotting away chunks of flesh, and just rummaging through them, looking over the shoulder with a scattered look, and pulls up what looks to be a long-decomposed and somewhat mummified humanoid arm. The fingers are kind of locked up in this way, and there's a small brass bracelet around the center of the wrist.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now you have our attention.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He shakes it and you hear it rattling.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What can you tell us about that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sounds of disgust)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I snatch it from him. Yrat, do the thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I ritually cast Identify on the bracelet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The bracelet essentially acts as a divination beacon. It's attuned to a secondary device that can keep watch on this one. Apparently whoever previously wore this was doing so under the intent of relaying their travel or experience to somewhere else, and then met a very terrible end.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, so it's useless to us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe. Not everything you encounter is going to be useful, guys!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah no, that's fine, that's fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, it's to relay information back to whoever's wearing it? Or to him specifically?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To whoever has the other object that's paired with this that you don't know what that is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We found a single walkie-talkie.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tary, is that thing working right now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it working right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I -- Detect Magic on it? Is it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is magical, it is functional.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As far as I know, someone is watching this right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know how old it is or how long it's been there, but it is magical.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mistress, would you like this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll take it for good measure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, really.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How much would you like for this? What do they--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just want this as a souvenir for our visit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I just want the one walkie talkie that doesn't have a pair.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not going to pay for it. You're not going to sell this; I want it. Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see the brow furrow, and there's a moment of instinctual anger and frustration, like a kid who had his lunch money taken, but he's still like (angry breathing), goes and sits down on the stool once more, the long knobby knees almost jesting up to shoulder height as it sits, its arms draped over the front, and the fingers dragging across the ground in front as it does, as it looks up, "Take it."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I lean forward and I take my erinyes nail and I go around his face, and I say, consider this a good-faith investment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, yes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You will be seeing us again. And I take out 20 gold. 20 gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes it and goes: "I will be a favor to the mistress."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We hear you utter our description to anyone, and you will never see anything again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, no, no."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't we want the purple gobstopper?

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: No, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got plenty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's coin around here, though. We might need it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His hands clasp together, overlapping in front of him. He's looking up at you with this new grin, almost like, now there's been a moment of acceptance or a moment of some sort of, in his eyes, a union.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you minions would like to buy the purple stone with your allowance--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, motherfucker.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- the mistress grants you, you may.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How much for the pretty?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks so much, mistress.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perhaps you would like to shift back to your normal form.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're welcome, young Wade.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For the purple stone --"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "1500 gold pieces."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That number does not please the mistress, I don't think. Does it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here you go. 1500 gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you throw the sack there is a--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (grunts) And sets it down next to it, stands up, grabs and takes the geode off the shelf and hands it to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Mistress is pleased, yes?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Very. Keep it that way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Autobots--

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Roll out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was taking everything to not say "Autobots!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you guys step out of the facility into the center of town, you sense the final moments of your Shapechange spell--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- beginning to dissipate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I kind of want to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, before we leave, I want to hang back just for a sec, and, hey, Slenderman. You seem a nervous type. You keep to yourself, do you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maybe."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where would you not go, to stay out from under the noses of your betters?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't understand."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You hide in your shop. Where do you avoid so you don't get stepped on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He leans out of the door with you and points towards the iron tower.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're about to leave, he grabs the back of your cloak and pulls you in, points past your shoulders, his long jagged curved claw, and you notice as two more of these flying entities that scoot by, one of them perching on a building across the way, wearing the golden armor, stop and, "The Whisperers." And then pushes you back out of the street and you hear the shifting of metal behind you, as a large slab is shifted to close the front of the shop.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I use Alter Self to go to my tiefling form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to keep an eye out for all of those imps in gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Same.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24, Okay--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! Between the two of you, looking up, there are-- at the peripheral of your vision and the bits of the green ash clouds that make up the sky as the occasional flashes of lightning streak through it from within, you see the shadows of hundreds of flying entities that seem to be just running paths, keeping watch, many just stop and perch for a moment, glancing over the street, and then take off again. Many of them wearing the same gold armor, these Whisperers appear to be everywhere and watching everyone. There is --

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But they're not paying us special attention at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a handful that seem to be genuinely interested in keeping an eye on you, but you also see other ones that are genuinely keeping an eye on anyone else wandering the street.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So the man on top has cast a wide net over this city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems that way, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's no way we're unseen. Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As we start-- are we walking back towards the tavern? As we walk, I--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take a slightly different route back, just to try and see more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So it seems one of the lesser devils who is interested in Vax might be our ticket in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The chain guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The chain guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you scry him, since you've seen him before?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a good idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I guess I could.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's scry ourselves a chain devil.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm wondering if worst-case scenario we could always use you as bait, Vax?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wode.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, Wode.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wode.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks, Wade.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's cool, brah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Party on, Wode.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Party on, Wade. Let's scry!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We get back. Okay, we gotta get back to the tavern. Back to the tavern?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you head back, and you're scrying on the chain devil you saw before? Okay.

lines.name: GROG
lines.text: Any chance he'll see you do it then?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, is he going to know?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, who cares.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, now we're carefree! Oh good, I love it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, to be fair, I feel like these people are used to being watched.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, what's your spell DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You finish the ritual, and as you focus, there's a flash of red-hot energy in your eyes, and then the spell comes to an end.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he like Hotis?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you zero in?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hate it when that happens! It's like a flashbulb going off in your eye!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could you do it at a higher level?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So, nothing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got 4th-level spells and lower.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Balls.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is the Vassalage? That is a good question. Shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Welp.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are they up in-- We went up to the room, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does anybody want to try the meat stuff downstairs?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like it's human remains, I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But you don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't look appealing to me, Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a very active imagination when I eat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't. I'll be right back. I go downstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You head downstairs--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to accompany Grog, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As the two of you head down, you can see-- There's that one central table to the left western side of the room that has almost like a trough look to it, with the jagged edges?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yup.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently has four imps that are perched on the edge that are just tearing into bits, tearing it off and chewing and they all stop and look up at you, all four at once, as you walk down and they all just slowly chew as you approach and walk into the chamber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are they wearing armor and shit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's currently at the bar area talking with his rotund barkeep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, that stuff, right, that normal people have. Can I have like, a little plate of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "On the house."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's very kind of you. See? Look, experimenting with new cultures is really quite nice. New tastes and all. What does it look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like-- You know steak tartare where it has that purplish-red color to it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very red.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Imagine that, but there's a series of jagged bone shards sticking out at sections of it, like whatever it was carved off of had been pulverized before it was butchered.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mm. Tenderized.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it is seeping this sludge-like, bloody fluid that is just pooled around it on this iron platter.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wode, would you want any of this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "You know, I'm going to watch-- You go first." And I put my hand on his arm and say, "Let's just see how you do." And I don't take my hand off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. I'll take one of the little bones out, and I spoon together like, a good chunk like spaghetti on a fork. And I pop it right in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Well, there are no utensils.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no, I'm using the bone as the utensil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Using the bone as the utensil, okay. As you spool it up, pop it in and chew, it's-- it's very gamey. It's warm. But the flavor, it's-- it's very iron-like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like chewing on pennies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of, yeah, and a similar texture. The bones do tear into parts of your upper lip.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hurts.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say, in the process of devouring this one bite, you do suffer-- You suffer two points of piercing damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking hell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Little by little, Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's the little things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're chewing-- Vax, you watch Grog squinting his eyes a bit and chewing as bits of blood begin to dribble down the sides of his chin, but a bright red color, not the color of the meat that he's eating.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I feel high? Like Freddie did when he consumed the little orb of-- ?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you do not. You chew it, you swallow it, it hurts and grinds its way down, hits your stomach. There is a slight numbness to the inside as you eat it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But that's the most you get.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You all right? You feeling all right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's the aftertaste like?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It kind of tastes like if you took a bunch of rusty nails and then shoved them in your thumb and then sucked on that for a while.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Huh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was-- very specific.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you done that before?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, but I feel like you have.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you not?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't worry about it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Yeah. I have another bite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You, bite by bite, begin to finish the meal. I'd say, for the remainder of it, you suffer another three points of piercing damage, but you do finish the flesh in front of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My plate of flesh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He legitimately seems fine? He's all right, he's not like-- veins aren't popping out, nothing amiss?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My compliments to the chef.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His already somewhat greasy, ruddy cheeks go to a blushing smile. "Thank you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wode, do you want to go back up-- (hiccups) -- stairs?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Yeah." I grab a small, just a small piece and put it in my mouth, and I spit it out immediately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Immediately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty awful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it salty?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not for everyone, yeah. Cook is right there, literally. Sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hah, yeah. Let's go back up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys head back up. So what's everyone doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jeez. Well, I feel like we're not getting very far in the city.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we're kind of eatin' it in here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we take the contract.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hate to say, "I told you so--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take the contract.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Percy--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy, you're not taking this contract.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm the one who's already touched by demonic forces. I think I can resist the temptations of the second and third pact.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we need to demand a guide, and I think we need to demand safe passage out of the prison, as well, and back to our original plane as best he can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, that sounds right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I must request that I sign the contract. I can't let you do this, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seems fair.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yrat, that is most noble of you. You truly are earning your place here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tary, that's so kind! Are you sure you want to?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unless, of course, you want to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yrat, you will be a hero to many.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Such a hero!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I've never met a hero braver than you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give him a pen.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't actually have it with us, we'd have to go downstairs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But I will-- Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, Yrat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll say-- I feel my weaknesses in my heart, and I know where they lie, and I definitely know they exist. And I-- Nothing in this agreement tempts me. I have temptations, but they are not in this contract.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And besides, you have us around you, friend.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it only because you've experienced these types of temptations before?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think so. And I'm already-- I don't know what's going to happen to me when I die.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, so you're signing it, now? I thought I was signing it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were messing with you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: -- but if you feel the urge to actually take it upon yourself--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I do think it might actually help me in my future-- Part of it could actually help me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How so?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, you would actually sell your soul?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, not that part. But I could use a cadre of devils at some point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then your soul would be forfeit!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No-- no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, actually, not on that one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's pact two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, we'd just have to release a couple of devils into the material plane.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about no on that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I agree.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because then we'd have to fight them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we please go sign this contract?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we could. Where in the contract does it say we can't kill them as soon as we release them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nowhere.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Freddie has a little more experience than you, and I think that we can put our faith in that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not going to say that I'm never going to do anything stupid again, and I certainly wouldn't necessarily want you to stop me if I were, but I'm not going to do this sort of stupid, am I?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy, if you die, though, doesn't this mean that you forfeit your soul here--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm pretty sure it doesn't. If I die before it's finished--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, no. If you complete the third pact--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still live, but then when you die your soul is forfeit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But if I don't complete the third pact, or if we don't activate the second or the third pact, then I'm fine--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, then there's no problem whatsoever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And if by any means, at any point you break the contract--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yeah, if we do not kill who we're supposed to kill, or if it leads back to him, then I'm--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, if you die in the process--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're fine?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, then your soul goes here--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To be fair, we're already here!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was my question. Yes, but we came here willingly--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you could become one of those melty guys!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know, it's entirely possible that there'll be several creatures fighting over my body when I die, and my soul when I die, already.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll be one of them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bless you. But no, seriously. I don't know what any of this means.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy, we've come here to try and kill a kitten, and it's already been a massive pain in our ass. We really don't want to come back to try and save your soul.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, you'll already be here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So? Don't die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we won't die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, cool! Can we--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And actually, it's not that clear what would happen if I died without completing the contract. I might just get brought back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be a conversation to have with the scribe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So yep, I'm going to go down. I'm going to sign it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go down with you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Talk about-- talk about the revisions first! Always get those revisions first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're doing it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And a new print-up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With a red pen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So, all of you head down into the main chamber of the tavern, and there, returning to the table where he once sat, you see Ipkesh. No wine glass, but the paper folded out in front, waiting patiently with his hands folded in the front.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Some quick questions--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, please."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I need a guide. Someone who, while is not connected to you, can help us find our way through the city. Find what we need. Answer questions. Somebody with a little bit of the lay of the land. Somebody to help. Not with the actual act, obviously, but just to run us around? What happens to our soul-- what happens to my soul if I die in the process of this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If the rest of your friends complete the contract, your soul is fine."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And if we don't complete the contract, then--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you don't complete the contract, you are in breach."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are they in breach, or just me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perfect. Safe passage into the Bastion of Flesh. Once we're there, we're on our own?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, I can ensure "that you are brought there unharmed."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With access to our foe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can imagine that can be arranged."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can it be arranged in writing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To the extent of my capabilities, yes. Just as you have limitations, as do I."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would be very pleased if we could complete this contract, if this contract becomes null and void, not with us getting to the Bastion of Flesh, but with our return to our plane, with our enemy harmed. We get what we want, you get what you want. Not we get towards what we want, you get what you want.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But where in this is it fair for me to suffer for your stupidity?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is a question for the ages, isn't it? (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That we need on a t-shirt!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can at least contain in the contract, once our foe is dispatched, that you will help us arrange safe passage out of here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'll help us arrange our own passage-- We have a way out of this material plane, we just need to make sure that we're-- Is there anything in the prison that would not allow us to leave under our own power?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Bastion of Flesh is where they keep all the "living mortals that were captured on this plane and not yet fully corrupt."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do they take our possessions before we go in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They would. However, if you so wish, I can arrange to have them "maintained in your presence."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That would be nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would be-- quite pleasing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you do that, he grabs the paper and pulls it over, and just takes his finger and writes it across, and as he does it amends the words in the contract in front of you to include the guide to lead you to where you're going, as well as allowing your equipment to also-- unharmed and unspoiled, and within your grasp.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That will do. You do not have knowledge of whether or not our magics will work in that prison?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do not."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I insight check him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He seems honest. You get the sense here: he doesn't gain anything if you all fail. If you complete both sides of the contract and then he dies, he gets nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you were to escape--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If-- I dunno.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was like an old woman was trying to talk to us!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But yes. So, you get the sense that the purpose of this contract is in hopes of eventual corruption.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That seems fair. I suppose the last question-- And this is just my last addendment, is that we own an artifact of this plane. We would like it if possible to be identified, and for you not to speak to anyone of what we have or what it's worthwhile, and to keep our presence-- confidential, as much as we keep yours confidential. Mutual confidentiality.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have nothing to gain by revealing your presence."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there any way in this contract we could add a clause where you preorder a thousand or so books to be sold by you here, later?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can write up a different contract for you, if you like."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to-- Can I show him the ring?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog, would you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Greg.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Greg, could you please show him-- I have to sign it with my own name, I imagine, anyway-- Can you show him the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What you got?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jared.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your piece.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He kind of leans in and squints. "Hm. It is a signet of the cult of Asmodeus. It is a trifle "here, but is used on your plane to assert belonging."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mmm. Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you sure you want to do this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Last question. The final question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How powerful is the Herald of Vassalage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Herald is quite powerful. The Herald resides within his stronghold--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We would have to get into his stronghold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You would."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many enemies are we talking about fighting, as well as him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "General, guarding throughout the stronghold, I'd put it at about a dozen, maybe."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And what sort of forces does he have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Those are his forces locally. He has guards throughout the city, but they're scattered. Thus, "the importance of this is to go in unseen and unheard. And if you run into resistance, squash it "before it can make any noise."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What kind of devils are we talking about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe a bone devil, maybe two, I don't know."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And this creature itself? A horn devil?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, this is a pit fiend."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, again? Jesus, fuck--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is this 'we'?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we're a team now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But Utugash is strong but slow. Slovenly, sluggish. Has reveled in his own opulence for far "too long."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's another dead pit fiend in hell?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll sign it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ask about the Bastion of Flesh--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it. Do it now, do it quickly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ask about the Bastion of Flesh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fred, get that, sign it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What about the Bastion of Flesh?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, how big is this prison--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe I should sign this, I don't want you to corrupt yourself senselessly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Arm wrestle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I push Yrat back, away from Freddie.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're here, enjoy the ride. Freddie has this, thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm signing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my lord.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I check to see his name, is it his real name that is signed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, it seems to be the contract wouldn't be binding on his end if it wasn't.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm, all right. Not the full name, but enough.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not the full name?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: PDR.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: D. Rolo.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (high-pitched) D-Roll!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Musel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have to write the entire name.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Musel

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no, wait, it's happen-- No, I'm not doing that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) We'll say you do, in character.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I've actually finished it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you finish signing, the ink kind of flashes and glows and it burns into the parchment ever so slightly, to the point where you smell the scent of just slightly singed parchment. It curls up away from you and into his grasp as he takes it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's a devil to a man who fears no god?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hm. Pleasure doing business. Now." And he snaps his fingers, and you watch, kind of apparate on one shoulder, one of the imps that you saw earlier--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Oh, those little guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- when you arrived, that kind of saw you and rushed out when you were coming downstairs. It appears on his shoulder. "This is Vasa. He will be your guide."

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Vasa.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With an r, or with an h?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that sounds familiar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vasa. V-A-S-A.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course our father would be named after a fucking imp.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vessar is your last name. Vasa is different.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sounds close e-fucking-nough.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whitney warned me it would come to this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who? What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's my sister, you never met her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But be careful."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Any advice would be welcome. We want what you want.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know. Rest. Prepare. Enter where is easiest, always the path of least resistance. Get "the jump, surprise and silence. When it's time to leave, I can help you travel mostly unseen, should "you avoid some of the more piercing eyes of this domain."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would you know where to get a Silence spell, out of curiosity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can provide maybe one or two."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One would be-- two would be even more helpful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. Rest. I'll be here waiting."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If no one sees us kill him, how will we be arrested?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't worry, I'll know when he's down as I'm sending Vasa along with you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And once this is known, just wait. Because the alarm will call the guard, specifically the "ones that work for me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, we should make sure after we kill this big guy not to kill anyone else that comes for us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No one that seem to be under his employ, no. Otherwise, clear them out."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Perfectly simple.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go plan our attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you guys make your way back to your room to discuss, we're going to take a break.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll be back here in just a few moments. We have our tiger maple dice tower giveaway at the break from our friends at--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, tiger maple!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh my god, it's all in pieces still, oh god! But yeah, it's all magnetically put together.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make-- make the-- the weird little magnet things happen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, you can make it--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, it's a dice tower?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a dice tower where you make the magnets happen

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do we have a code word for the chat?

lines.name: CREW
lines.text: You pick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: P-A-C-T.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So go ahead and come over to the Twitch chat room, use the word 'pact' in there to join the chance giveaway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And take the survey if you have a moment!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go take that survey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome! See you guys in a few minutes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pact! [break]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And well won! There you go. Get that info for you and get that sent out to you ASAP, so congratulations. Also, I forgot to mention because I didn't put it on the thing before, but I'm also, I'll put it on Twitter, I'm going to be guesting at Sakura Con, middle of April, April 14th to the 16th up in Seattle. So if you guys are up there in that area come say hi.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Easter weekend!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Panels and signings and all that fun stuff. So folks near and around the Seattle area, come up to Sakura Con and say hi.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going camping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's exciting.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's going to be so good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Bringing it back in. So you guys have signed a contract. What do you to prep? What are you doing now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Going to sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, we need to prep anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're locked in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Only one of us is locked in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, what's our plan? We go in, we fucking try to stealth as much as fucking possible and kill a fucking pit fiend.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stealth in, kill a pit fiend. Done it before, we can do it again. Okay, I'm confident about this plan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How did we do it-- Wait, wait, wait. Let's just remember, how did we do it last time?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How did we do it last time?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We bumblefucked our way into it, got super super lucky--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And bumblefucked our way out of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was he weak to anything that we remember?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nothing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But he was extremely frightening.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And smart. Very smart.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, so definitely do a Feast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And poison.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can do-- Nope, nope, I can't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys technically are still under the effects of a Feast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but we won't be when we go to fight him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Depends on how soon you get there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're sleeping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Feast lasts for 24 hours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So if we rest--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been probably, if you start resting fairly soon, it will have been maybe four to five hours after you used this-- or ate the Feast. With the eight hours' full rest, you're still looking at almost half a day left. It's up to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, let's do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I for one am going to have some sleepy time tea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could use a recharge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Warm milk of the damned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All that thinking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, let's go to sleep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eat your cheerios, bud.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys have an evening's rest in the second layer of hell, within the Iron City of Dis.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are the beds painfully hot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The beds are warm. They're very toasty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It can be done. But you're sweaty and it's not very comfortable.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What, the sheets?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The whole experience.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have someone fanning me the entire night.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Doty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does help somewhat. You're the most comfortable sleeper in the entire group. All right, I need all of you guys to roll a wisdom saving throw, if you don't mind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At advantage though, right? Because of the Heroes' Feast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's correct.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20 here as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got a 17 and an 18, that's pretty damn good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do. Wisdom saving?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With advantage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys all awaken, rested, as you know, in a similar way you're rested after being out open under the night's sky on the side of the road in a campsite. It's not the best rest, but it's enough to at least continue with some wind back in your sails. Other than that, you are feeling a little bit hungry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How am I feeling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're feeling fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't we still have some rations that we have been carrying around with us for quite some time?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean yeah, we have a lot of stuff in the bag of colding.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we have any souls?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The stuff downstairs is really not that bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No souls in the bag of colding, but we do have--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it not that bad or is it just slightly above awful?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We do have half a thing of boar meat and some grain. Just some random grain. Which I think is like oatmeal oats, maybe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Put some hot water on it and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All water here is hot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to sit the boar meat down on the ground and cook it a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And actually it cooks pretty easily. There are portions of the iron metal, especially on the bottom floor, that cook it pretty well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use the gun barrel to sear it a bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, make some grill marks on that thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. And you manage to cook a decent-- And the boar meat's been frozen for a while, so it's not the best, but it's better than bone splinter meat chunks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or eating souls.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't judge it until you try it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did that use up all of the boar meat? Or am I down to like a quarter of a boar meat now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much did you have?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Half a boar meat. I have no idea what that means.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Half a boar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Half a boar meat? Half a boar, between all of you guys, including Grog's appetite, I'd say that's about it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That boar is gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's like Super Nintendo lingo. Can I have half a boar meat?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's the worst eraser. It just made a pink smudge across the page.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the worst.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'd like to try my eraser?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, this one's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm proud of us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look at us using rations!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've never done that before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not since the beginning, yeah. All righty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Where do we find this-- Oh, wait, did Zahra-- Vasa spend the night with us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where is Vasa?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Downstairs, I assume.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Should we go downstairs and find Vasa, because that's who's going to lead us to this place, right? Vasa! Vasa!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't speak so loudly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, you said not to whisper.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't say not to whisper.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't make a scene, either. It's important.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Act natural.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just be as cool and calm as possible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. Don't act natural, be as cool and calm as possible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And he's doing that, unfortunately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm always cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the spirit. Just like that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good acting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we see the imp downstairs anywhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you head downstairs, you do notice that Ipkesh is sitting at one of the chairs at the far end of the bar. The usual keeper of the establishment is not currently there. There is nobody else in the bottom portion. It is empty, and the imp, Vasa, is currently resting on the shoulder of Ipkesh, as you approach.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Close it down for a bit, did you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just to be safe. Best not to have individuals knowing of our present arrangements or "your group exit applying to me."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're going to introduce us to your little friend there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He did. It's Vasa.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know his name, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Vasa will be able to bring you to your location. Vasa's mastery is in not being seen and "keeping beneath the eyes of the Whisperers. Vasa will not be able to aid you in the confrontation, "for Vasa is as strong as the parchment you signed yesterday."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Any luck on those other materials? Silence spell or two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Mm-hm." And he pulls from a small satchel on the side of his long, black and purple robe, this small, leather case that is locked on one side. And as he pulls it open and reveals this very, very tightly wound piece of parchment, and he hands it over. "This is a Silence spell. I "could not procure two, unfortunately. But this will aid you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Whisperers you speak of. Do they see through illusions?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Whisperers, they do not see through illusions, but they do see through invisibility."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "At least-- not all of them. The bigger ones. If you see any that are larger than our "winged compatriot here, those are the ones to avoid."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I feel like a good idea would be to just--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. But I mean, can't we just Alter Selves into little bugs or something, and get in behind him? Surprise him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's not a Polymorph spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could Animal Shapes us there, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many of us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All of us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then you'd be down a spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eighth level, but it could be worth it to not be seen and get the drop.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you think that sounds like a reasonable plan or do you think that's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That sounds, if that is within your capability, that sounds very reasonable."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Vasa could get us into the keep? As insects?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Vasa could show you the way in, yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could be good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we-- yeah, are we wasting spells just to get there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A spell. But it's a surprise attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I imagine we'd get there, do Animal Shapes to get through and get to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then pop out and attack him, right from bugness.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Bugness Everdeen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. That was sour.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I liked it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. Laura liked it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With the right conditions, if we keep quiet, I can lay some pretty heavy hurt on this guy at the get-go. If we keep quiet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Let's bug it up, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, this is Animal Shapes into a-- What form are you taking?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we doing it now or later?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Later. Not now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. But what form are you taking?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me figure that out. Who's got a Player's Handbook in the house?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right here. 20 foot radius, centered on a point, not on a object.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Animal Shapes. What are you looking at?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is us. Looking at Silence spells.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Animal Shapes. Basically, you guys can become a large or smaller beast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Large or smaller beast. So I can't do anything--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can't be insects? Are those beasts?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- microscopic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Micro-- No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not microscopic but tiny. I can't be tiny?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, bird-size would be about as small as you could get.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bird-size.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Boy, that sure sounds like food.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, are there any other creatures here that are small that go unseen? The size of rats or birds of some sort?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, there are fiendish variations and there are rats that exist on this plane, though "life for them is not very enjoyable."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We would be running on the blazing hot ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right. Poor little burning rats.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And flying in the imp-covered air.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Didn't he say Vasa can get us there, right? Can get us safe passage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck it. I was just thinking it was a thing, but forget it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's all in the contract.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So. Shall Vasa guide you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, let's do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well." Taps the edge and Vasa's been watching, goes, "Come follow me." And takes off of the side of his shoulder.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He talks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Come. Come."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We go. We follow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will lead us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we need Pass Without A Trace?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I cast Pass Without A Trace on us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm Alter Selfing into my tiefling form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, I need you all to make stealth checks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With advantage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. No, add ten.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Motherfucker. Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two in a row.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And this process of rubberbanding behind Vasa continues over the next half an hour or so, going deeper and deeper into the city. And as you go, Vex, you're keeping a pretty close watch on where you're coming from, though you're also seeing large groups of lemures, which is how it's pronounced as I've been corrected and I'm so glad it's pronounced that and not lemurs, because that sounds awful as hell. It's lemure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But lemurs are so cute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. And they're not cute. They're horrible, fleshy, tortured souls.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's my nickname, man. Don't shit on my nickname.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lemurs!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see clusters of lemures throughout the city. As well as low-level spine devils and some other fiendish creatures that are in the process of rebuilding and reconstructing buildings, and tearing down others. You start seeing elements of the city are constantly in a state of being restructured, rebuilt. Sometimes more grandiose, sometimes more awful and terrifying. And you get the sense that the city is in a perpetual state of flux. That gleaming, iron tower still just beyond your visual sight whenever you have to readjust your vision across the horizon. I need you guys to all make another stealth check. For these different steps of the journey.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With the plus ten?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mm-hm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, Percy!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, golden snitch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Freddie.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There was something about that coffee cup being there. There we go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I share some of my 37 with Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doesn't-- So as you guys are moving along, watching Vasa, Vasa eventually gets out of sight for a moment and you all stop and pull back. And you see a flash of light that signifies Vasa calling you forward and that it's safe. And as you all move forward, you watch as Taryon and Percival were both looking behind, keeping watch on your back, and by the time they look back you guys are already about 20 feet ahead. And as they rush forward, Percival straight up-- His foot hits the edge of where two of the iron rifts in the ground, the plating that meets up this part of the alleyway. He stumbles forward, landing hard on his elbow and giving out a (groan) of his breath. And as he does, you hear a (imp sound) and you watch as a small, impish creature in golden armor begins to crawl over the roof of the nearby building and look over the side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I turn and break away from the group and head in a slightly different direction for a moment and sit and nurse my elbow, and try and just look like I'm dealing with my medical issue and really try to look like I didn't notice the thing that's watching me now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Meh. Deception?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine? Okay. So you watch the creature (imp sounds) and slowly crawls along the top of the roof, as you go and split off from the rest of the party. You hear behind you the (imp talking) some sort of conversation, and then a second one appears. And one continues to follow you, while the other one continues to move with Taryon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I have any of the soul--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did I see him break off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you watch as, after he gets back up, he breaks off from the rest of the group.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to stick with him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you're both now being followed by two of these--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One moment. I'm going to pull out a piece of the soul, the edible soul, and just about to eat it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do the rest of us see this, by the way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all just made it past this open walkway in the street, turned around another alley, and you watched this happen across the way. They're about 15, 20 feet from you, in an open road.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to quietly follow behind the imps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The imps are on the other side of the road from you right now. If you want to, you can try in a moment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, never mind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm going to, not quite loudly, but with a bit (disgusted sound) and I'm going to huck it in the other direction with distaste.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. One of the two imps breaks off and swoops down after it, and immediately runs over and starts scattering across the ground trying to catch it as it tumbles off of the side. The other one continues to follow after the two of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we try and give it the slip?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can try to make us invisible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It won't work.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It won't work?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They see through invisibility.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bigger ones do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought you said the Whisperers saw through invisibility?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of the Whisperers do, some don't. He said be wary of the bigger ones. They see through invisibility and possibly other things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you think?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to dust myself off and try and just meander into a shadow. I still have Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to see if I can just vanish stealthily.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make it with disadvantage, because you are being actively watched.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am being actively watched?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can turn around the corner and attempt it, but you know. It is aware that you walked there, so your ability to slip out of its view once you break from its line of sight is going to be this check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm also going to-- Can I also use my boots of spider walking to see if I can crawl off the street a little bit and see if I can--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, let's try it. Go ahead and make your stealth check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can certainly try.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Disadvantage. I hate disadvantage so much. That's cocked. It doesn't matter though, it's awful. Yeah, never mind, I fail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, as you turn around the corner, you step onto the side of the wall. Hearing the impact of the boots across the iron side. Thankfully, it's enchanted boots, so the damage is relatively minimal, but you do hear the very faint sizzle of leather on hot metal. What are you doing, Tary?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well. I will cast Invisibility on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And that's all I can do for my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as this one is following Percival around the corner, the one that was going after you, that was distracted by the stone, you turn invisible, and it glances around and has lost sight of you for the moment. And it continues to push after Percival.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to stick with Percival, but in an invisible way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just-- I'm going to keep talking over the headphones, trying to keep up with where everyone else is, but walking off a block, in the hopes of sort of bullshitting my way through this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you head down this alleyway, and you guys are parallel following on the side, watching this from a distance, but staying out of sight, without making yourselves visible. Percival, you look up and you see this strange, eerie green glow that begins to drift in your direction. You watch as these spectral arms begin to drift up out of the ground, and this elongated horrifying face pulls up from underneath the darkened cobblestones of the street. And this specter entity drifts in your direction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I recognize what this specter entity is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They seem to wander aimlessly throughout.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am whispering the incantation for Invisibility into a coin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That takes a minute to do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It does? Fuck. Then I'm not doing it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and keep pace with that thing. Is it following me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance over your shoulder and see it and it is currently crawled around the side and it's leaping from these windowsills, these small iron squares that are about that big, that are built into the side of these walls here. It's leaping and flying from section to section, staying immediately 15 feet, 20 feet behind you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I trail this thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to go and follow?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You said 20 feet behind us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about 20 feet behind you, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, about 15 feet up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it, roll for an attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is this, plus my spell attack bonus? No, it's just an attack? What is this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It should say under your ability here. I'll pull it up if you want.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I rolling for the throw, or for the spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is for the throw. Or, is it the creature's saving throw, which is it? Which of the two? Let me go look, actually.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just had five of the worst rolls I've ever had in a row. That was just ugly. There was just ugliness happening, and I don't feel it's gone yet. It's not the dice, it's in me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the tanglefoot bag?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what happens when you sell out, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shut up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what you do is, it splats against it, and you watch it (choking noise), it gets stuck and sapped into it. It's moving now at half pace, it's having to pull through this substance that's glued to its feet and it's trying to tear away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's all I got.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got a 46 on stealth, can I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You turn around the corner now and you see, first off, Taryon appears, because when you throw the bag it breaks your invisibility.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's an attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit. Okay, it's worth it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So now you see Percival and Taryon both appear, and this one impish creature is now currently partially glued to a wall and is fighting, trying to pull its way out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's run!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It looks like a target. Whisper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With a 46 stealth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So go ahead and roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would this be a surprise, if I'm that stealthed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It is aware that there are threats in its vicinity, so it's not a surprise attack. But it does not see you, so you have advantage on the attack. It is considered a Sneak Attack if you hit it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 25 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. 12, and I will do a second attack as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much damage is the first attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 damage? It's Sneak Attack, because it didn't see you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh wait no, it is Sneak Attack, right? Thanks. 12, 25, 27, 33, 35, 42, plus psychic damage from that, 42, so 45.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So right as it's pulling away from this tanglefoot bag, this explosion of glue, it's like (rasping noise), and the dagger just slips through it, and you watch as it goes in four different pieces and retracts into the tanglefoot bag muck once more. It got completely shredded, and the sections are withdrawn back and stuck to it as it is slowly now dribbling out of this massive glue on the side of the building, which is now starting to bubble from the heat from the side of this structure.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Tar pits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take this opportunity to try and turn another corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The impish creature that was distracted by your stone is now attempting to catch up. I want the three of you to make one more stealth check, since you've all revealed yourselves.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on! Don't fuck up, Percy! Don't fuck up! It's all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys, darting into the shadows, rush around the corner. You hear in the distance the clattering of tiny imp claws, and the impacts of it doing the same perch-to-perch, gliding through the alleyway. You turn the corner and join up with the rest of the party. You hear in the distance some sort of a distant barking call in the language you don't understand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, like raptors.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to say, Jurassic Park.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're going to be the lookout now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gather that they've acknowledged that there has been a Whisperer slain in the alley, so you might want to hurry.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you turn one of the corners, you look and see giant pyres of molten metal and fire. There is a gargantuan forge where people are-- I say people, these devilish entities-- and hundreds of lemures are just heaping large bits of iron ingots and scrap metal from fallen buildings and tossing them into this forge. Every time they do, there's a burst of flame and ash and cinder come pouring out of it. From there, you can see refined metals being pulled out and brought to other elements of this city. Beyond that, as you glance over, you can hear this faint echoing sound of hundreds upon hundreds of voices, all moaning, screaming, squealing, in torturous pain. You don't have a view of what's causing it, but this whole area of this city just brings this terrifying presence of all the torment you'd expect from somewhere in the Hells. As you pause a moment, Vasa darts back, trying to usher you forward in the direction of the sound. "Come, come, follow." And then vanishes once again, appearing on the other side of the street, and then beckoning you once more. For the last leg, I need everyone to make one more stealth check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, Percy, for fuck's sake.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you're waiting for the right moment to cross the street, you wait for one cluster of these tiny winged, not quite imps, they're a little larger than imps, with this dark bluish-green spine protrusions out of the wings, and their heads are these giant bony ridges that go back, and they have these long spears. And about two dozen of them come down this street in a vast cluster, almost like a bat storm, a whole bunch of just randomly flying and angrily screeching creatures. And as you wait for that to pass, the minute that sound goes past, you dart across the alleyway and make it to the other side and turn just in time for the large heavy footfalls of what looks to be some sort of monstrosity. Multiple arms that are stitched to this large golem-like creature. It's humanoid, but it's about 15 feet tall, and it's just covered in stitches. Multiple chunks of different faces that are all just sewn together in places. You can see this series of gems that are imbedded in its shoulders and part of its throat that all pulse, like separate heartbeats that are out of pace with each other, and as it stumbles forward you see a chain around its neck and it's being dragged by this tiny imp that's just pulling it forward and tugging on it. It doesn't even make much of a noise other than a perpetual gurgle, but it's just some sort of flesh-stitched automaton that's being dragged forward to its next physical activity at the behest of whoever owns it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Freddie, you can't end up here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A few moments later, Vasa brings you to the outside of a large jet-black metallic and stone structure. A heavy thick-walled stronghold with a series of what looks like-- imagine a thick bramble forest made of twisted iron that surrounds the base of it, about five feet high. There are small gaps where you guys can try and squeeze through, for the more lithe folk. Grog, you're not quite sure how you're going to get over this without tearing bits of you apart. There's about a ten foot gap between this strange metal bramble fence, and the outside of this stronghold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: After I go through, stay here. I pop Trinket out, and then I reach my necklace through and say, get in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you get inside. You release him out on the other side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I put Trinket back in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Well done.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whoa. That was easier than I thought.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point you now have Doty on the other side just going (smashing noises).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can put Doty in there. I farted while I was inside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get in, Doty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tell Doty to get in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No effect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nothing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tell Doty to get in, maybe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doty, try your best to get in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's fine. I'll cast Fly on Doty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you think that's going to be noticeable?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How high up is it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's only five feet high.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, don't we have a magic carpet or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but we're trying to be stealthy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stealthy. With a robot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He can just edge along the top of the iron, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have been good enough to keep far enough ahead that this wandering metallic automaton about 25 feet behind you hasn't drawn any strange attention. Yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are there fissures? Steam vents?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No steam vents that you can see, it's just this tangled mass of thick metal cables, maybe about a foot thick, that have spikes jutting out of them. It's climbable, but there may be some damage taken in the process.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He said take the easiest way in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He said that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well then, Doty, go straight through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, Doty does suffer 12 points of piercing damage in the process, but emerges.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're so badass, Doty. Good job.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perhaps we should bend them back?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, how noticeable is the bent bars?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty noticeable, it's about that big around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can Doty put it back?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it Doty-shaped?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go, Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a strength check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes you a little bit of time, and you manage to squeeze it together.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus you put the gauntlets on, which are good for structures, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's essentially why he's able to do it on a roll of 15, because of his Siege ability. You do manage to squeeze it back together and close the hole.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Magic carpentry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, Vasa you see is now up on the side of this wall, and this stronghold has nearly no openings on any other side. However, there is a small sliver of an opening, it's almost like an exhaust on the higher end there, and Vasa is currently perched up onto it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How high?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About seven feet up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And how wide is this door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about a foot and a half high and about two and a half, three feet wide.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We want to get into this place, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well then, let's have a door. And I will pull my A Door out of my Robe of Useful Items and it put it on the side of the wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You do what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He pulls a patch out off of his robe and tears it off and slams it against the stone. As it does, you watch as, what was once solid black metal, a tiny seam of orange appears in a large rectangular pattern, and then opens ever so slightly on a hinge that wasn't there before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: After you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that's my kind of ridiculous.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This door cost a lot of money, just so you know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys peer inside, ever so carefully, do you guys want to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Very carefully, I want to just peek in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we still have Pass Without a Trace on?

lines.name: MATT, LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah! Nah, I don't see shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is very dark inside, there's a faint bit of almost like candlelight out of view, you can see there's a shifting glow internally that seems to have a life of a small flame.
