lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I gently push my sister to the side and try the same.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Too shadowed to make any details from this angle, as you've just peered past the door, but there does not appear to be any other moving or living creature in the chamber that you can see.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So none of those forms are moving, breathing, anything, as far as I can tell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as you can tell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take a moment longer and you see the one on the far table is breathing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. We have some deadish things in here, kind of moving--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dangerous things, or--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It looks like it. I'd like to go in and get a closer look. Is everybody cool with that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, roll a stealth check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's fine. That's 40 with the Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like a terrible nightmare version of Percy's work chamber back in Greyskull Keep. There are two doors in the room, one on the north side and one on the eastern side, and the body that's on one table you can see appears to be human, older male. There are signs of some sort of physical scarring on the body, whether it be necromantic or corruption-based, it has been long dead. There is a very strong smell of decay. The other table, you do see the slight moving chest of a living dwarf, a female dwarf that appears to be passed out, unconscious, and has suffered quite a bit of torturous wounds. You can see hundreds of small scratches and jagged dagger wounds in the side of the shoulders and arms, the face, and is currently strapped down to the table.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Am I within 50, 60 feet of that dwarf?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, Divine Sense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Divine Sense, to sense--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Presence of strong evil registers on my senses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Within 60 feet of you. All right. Nothing coming from that dwarf, but there are a number of other sources throughout the fortress. Not in the room, but within 60 feet of you, you get a view of the chamber to the north of you and a chamber to the east of you. The eastern chamber, nothing. The chamber to the north of you, just beyond that door, there is a signature.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the dwarf appears alive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. There's a woman dwarf in the room ahead of us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is she dangerous?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hard to say, I don't think so, but I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does she look familiar?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we go in and look?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all quietly make your way into the chambers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So quietly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to inch ahead of everybody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does she look like she regrets her decisions in life?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does she look like she belongs here? Is she naked?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does she have any unfortunate tattoos?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's not naked, she's wearing basic cloth clothing, but a lot of it has been torn and soaked deep, deep crimson with blood. A lot of it appears to be torn from stress and tension. There are claw marks from all over this chamber, from various demonic entities that have torn through here, but the table she's on as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go join my brother.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think this is a brilliant opportunity.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, she's not melted, like the poor shits we've seen all over this city.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The body suddenly stirs on the table.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hello.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you awake?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Noelle, if you want to step on in?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That just took, like, ten minutes to find her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on in, come on in!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Before we do this, can we have a ten-minute discussion about whether or not to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've been sitting there this whole damn time?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Already sass!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: It was just some light torture.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit, what if she wouldn't have been tortured if we'd gotten here earlier?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: By the way, for any future guests who want to come on the show, we don't normally treat our guests this way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's actually three more guests still waiting in line.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They've been here for weeks!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: It was horrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a noise, and as you come to in the darkened room with just the faint glow of the candelabra in the corner. You glance over a dart and you see a series of shapes filtering in from a door that you haven't noticed before in the chamber, and begin whispering to each other and then looking over to you occasionally. One of them suddenly goes "Hello," and the rest go "shh."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you alive?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hello!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I just sigh heavily and I go, who the fuck are you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to gingerly go over and very quietly say: we are a remarkable opportunity if you're willing to be quiet and maybe have a little faith in the truth in this very dark place.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's bleeding from her eyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you get a close look at her, too, you see she has darker auburn red hair with a shock of white-gray in it, shaved on the sides, one gnarled ear that has been chewed and torn and a series of scratch scars across the front of her face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will grab a healing draught and offer it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can cast Cure Wounds on her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's not fight, just heal her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just want to know if it's safe to heal her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Heal her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How did you get here?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: That's a pretty long story.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it safe to release you?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yes. Can I get off this table, please? What are we doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is she lashed to it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She is manacled to it. Both ankles and wrists are manacled to this table.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Cure Wounds on her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are the manacles trapped at all? I'm going to check for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Really high.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's make a deal. We let you go, you don't let anyone know we're here, and you don't try to kill us.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I insight check her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I got the worst insight ever into her. Ten.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll do it. 12.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She seems really honest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you get?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's hard to read. She seems brusque and, honestly, chained to a table and probably tortured.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: The blood doesn't help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll cast Cure Wounds at third level.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nothing you can do is as powerful as what I was about to give her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, then, never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's too late, you cast Cure Wounds. Go ahead and roll for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fine. I'm trying to be nice, trying to save you a damn spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear Taryon say that as soon as you finish casting the spell into the dwarf woman.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll see how well-- hmm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 18, plus--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is the most condescending "hmm" I think I've ever experienced!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I add anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You add your wisdom modifier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 18 plus three. 21 whole points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where once you're groggy, the sudden flash of the divine energy and the healing power that sifts through your body, it brings a moment of respite and calmness to you, and you feel a lot better than you did a few moments ago.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Cool. Can I get off this table now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vax, can you help me pick these locks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll, Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, a 31 or 33.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the manacles are not trapped.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. All right, give us a second, my sister and I will.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll work on the legs if you work on the hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So, go ahead, both you guys roll to pick locks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which is what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dex bonus plus your proficiency bonus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Awesome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) What's your name?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's your name?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Why are we whispering?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's bad guys everywhere, we're in hell!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Oh, right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you guys take a quick moment and very deftly and very quietly, the twins in unison release the manacles and you instinctively sit up and rub your wrists.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow, have you guys been rehearsing that? That was impressive. Good job, twins!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Whoa, there's two of them. Fuck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, it's confusing sometimes.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: What's your name?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) What's your name?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'm Tova.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Tova.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Who the fuck are you? Why are you in here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we're tourists.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, this is Freddie, that's Yrat, that's Wade and Wode, and that's Greg.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's not give too much info.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can call us Mox Vachina.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's put it this way. We're sneaking into this unholy compound in Dis, basically a city of hell, to do something inappropriate, we find you tied to a table, we figure that maybe you're in the mood to --

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Help out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you see season two of Prison Break? Because that's what we're doing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're here to solve a problem.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Are we killing something?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Can I come?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who put you here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's your shit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Tova, did you have a weapon when you were brought here?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I did, it was really cool, too. Can we go find it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, what'd you have?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Oh, shouldn't have moved that fast, hang on. Yeah, I have a maul.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: It's really cool, it's here somewhere. I don't know where.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we look around the room for the maul?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: How healed am I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, you're back to full.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Oh, cool!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you've been resting for a while and recovering from the wounds of the last torture session.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So there's no one else in here, right? Is it still dark?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The chamber has low flickering light from two different candelabras, one near you guys in the corner and one near the center doorways over here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I get the flametongue dagger out. Is your shit on the walls around here? Do you see it in here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I light up my hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys do a quick pass. You look around, and there are some chests around here and you carefully go through some of them that are left open, and you do not see any of your equipment within the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you see anything cool there?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Is there anything I can use?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a number of torture implements.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Can I have one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are chained hooks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike would be so happy right now, she loves torture devices.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'll get that big ol' fork.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a two-pronged long, thick metal fork.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not to slow your roll or nothing but I have a greatsword if you want one.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Ooh, yeah! No, that sounds better.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I put the fork back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you sure you can handle a greatsword? It's, like, big league.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'm very strong. It's probably bigger than I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But as a dwarf, you're stocky and strong with your background as well, it's not really an issue.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tova, that sword makes you look so tall.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck happened to your face? Shit.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Unfortunate home chemistry set accident.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, are you an alchemist?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: It wasn't my chemistry set.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you hear a (click) sound and a door beginning to open on the north end of the wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit, hide! Hide under the table!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I fall flat on the floor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I go still as a statue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make stealth checks, Taryon and Grog with disadvantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we still have Pass Without a Trace?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we still have Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 19 for me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A 19 and a 20. A natural 19 and a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With disadvantage, you got a 19? Holy shit! Oh, plus-- yeah, yeah.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Am I joining in here? Or can I just get back on the table?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get on the table if you want.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: All right, so I get back on the table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, but you do it noisily.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I flop down on the table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So the door opens, and as it does--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, oh god. Ah! Oh my god, oh my god, oh my god!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a map, it's a map!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A creature comes through, similar to Ipkesh, another humanoid, this one a little thicker, burlier, with a medium-grey hair that is kind of a tangled mass all into dreads right past the shoulders. Big, leathery red wings, red skin, horns at the front, and has a big sword it kind of is pulling out of a sheath on the side of it as it comes in, looking around the room. Which-- Immediately kind of steps into the chamber, as you guys all hide off to the side. "Shit!" And is going to turn around and just go running in the opposite direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! I shoot an arrow in the back of his neck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone, roll some initiative.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! Yes. Yes! That's bad, that's a natural one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Oh, man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was so excited and then it went away so quickly!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So, top of the round, we have 25 to 20. Anybody?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 to 20, anybody? Good?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, 21. Nice! All righty, 20 to 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. 15 to ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten to five? Five to one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Three?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, kids.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Percival, you're up first. You see this devilish humanoid--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: See you in 20 minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- beginning to pivot and turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you point to me on the map?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't use the gun. (muffled) Don't use the gun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to do a couple things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Blow the cover for everyone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Blow the cover for ev-- well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. Don't use the gun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take my movement to run around him and shut the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Using my boots. 'Cause my boots are already active.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. The doorway is about the size of him, so you--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, it's too big?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, it takes up the entire doorway, essentially, and it's just pivoting after it notices you guys, so you're gonna have to make a tumble check to try and make it past him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, okay, hold on then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An acrobatics roll, but yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll-- you know what, I'll do the acrobatics roll to try and shut the door, and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're trying to, basically, as he goes to spin around, you dash forward, and roll into a tumble to try and pop up on the other side, so go ahead and roll acrobatics check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do. 22.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will it do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20 on his end.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you tumble, not even noticing-- The world spins as you go into a roll and suddenly there's just a flash of white, and there's just a foot, a massive boot in your face as the individual slams a kick into your head to stop you from tumbling forward, and you stop in place. So you're currently prone on the ground, but you still have your action if you want to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take three slashes at him with my sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. You are prone. You have disadvantage on your attack rolls.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Disadvantage on the attack rolls?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But I am prone. Okay, so, attack number one. That don't matter. 28?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just do attack number two. That's 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 misses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, come on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And, uh, 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Go ahead and roll damage twice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Got two hits with the-- what's-- these.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And, Tova, you're up next, so be ready.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tova!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two hits, so that's--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it the quiet gun?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm using a sword, not a gun, so that's--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, right, right, right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 18 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 18 points of damage, and, you know, let's just burn a little bit of electricity too, just to hurt him as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 from both strikes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's everything combined.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then let's do a-- where is-- here we are. Let's do a-- where is the damage? 1d6 lightning, so let's just burn two charges of that as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm out of d6s for some reason that I cannot comprehend.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here. Here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And let's add five points of lightning damage to that as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What're you doing?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Gonna grab this cool new greatsword that I have, stand up on the table, and just jump at this guy's head, and swing at it with my cool new greatsword.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First one. This would be a plus ten because it's not magical, I believe, right.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: That's a 13 and a 17 to hit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, neither hit. The one--

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Been tied to a table for a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. The first one, it hits the front of its armor and just scrapes off the side. The other one, you swing back and it slams into the stonework, and it just ducks underneath. Bonus action, anything you want to do?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before it tries to run away?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I want to turn into a bear.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Double bear action!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sings) Tova's my favorite person in the whole universe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch now, you see the clothing that was on her before wasn't torn from torture, but her form rages into this bipedal humanoid bear with rippling muscles, the same scars across the face, and begins to just growl as the greatsword now looks almost small in comparison in this mighty kind of humanoid bear's grasp.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ah, she Beorn-ed it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the end of your turn.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'm just wearing sexy bear clothes now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like a bra, like a little bikini.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, the devil-creature is going to go ahead and turn around--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sort of like an 80s fantasy novel cover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- and attempt to move this way to the door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I get an attack of opportunity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys get an attack of opportunity as it rushes away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no, it's getting away?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No! Kill it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've gotta stop it, we've gotta stop it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Disadvantage or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, 'cause you're still prone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Percy. Oh, son of a bitch!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, go ahead and roll damage. That's 2d6 for the damage on the greatsword.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Okay, 2d-- Oh, sorry. Rusty at this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It'd be plus six. Because your strength is five and plus one there for the weapon.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: That is 2d6 plus one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus six total.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Okay, so that is 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and if you ever roll a one on the dice, or a one or a two, you can re-roll it once.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Point of random order before he runs--

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I can re-roll it twice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can roll each one once, like if it gets under that. It's part of your Great Weapon Master.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Random point of order, isn't this a surprise round?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They noticed us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He noticed us, okay, never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Well, I rolled another one, so it's the same, it's 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 13 points of damage. All righty. So you hack at it as it's running away, but it still manages to go-- get out over this side. It goes to the next door and throws it open.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's in it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you guys still can't quite see what's in that chamber beyond from your perspective. And is going to move in. It just gets about that far into the chamber. All right. That gets us to Vax's turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shit, and he's out of sight now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's just moved-- He's out of sight of you, currently, because you're over here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You don't see him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. I'm gonna-- I can't really see from where I'm at, so I want to move more in line with the door and see if I can see him if I run over in line.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. If you run to where the doorway is open, you can see him as he's just disappearing into a darkened chamber beyond.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dagger, dagger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: End this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: End this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First one is-- balls, is 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Misses.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Second one is a 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29 hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nyeh. Fuck a duck. There's two plus-- that is just two, but it's the poison dagger, so I'm gonna unload venom in him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: DC 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 12, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is 19. Yeah. Ten and a nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it, I'm out, I'm done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do have some more movement if you wanted to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I don't, I want to stay where I am.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Back out of the way of the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're going to stay in the doorway?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you can move out of the way of the doorway so that other people can shoot at him better, maybe, in line of sight. Just move out of the doorway!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nope. Nope!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Vex's turn! Vex, your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks for blocking my fucking shot!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm across the country, man, I can't really see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's all good. I mean, he's not-- He's staying low, and your brother knows not to block the whole path, so--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm always doing squats, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well then-- I'm going to shoot him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your brother?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! I'm going to shoot the dude, the red guy. I'm going to shoot him-- Yeah, I'm going to shoot him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, the first one is a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (silly voice) Okay. 11-- Fucking shit. 11 plus four lightning damage and then-- Ugh! I'm going to fucking Hunter's Mark him, motherfucker, because I forgot to do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because I'm a fucking asshole!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow. Wow, that's like six in one--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And the second one definitely hits him, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm keeping count.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You got to love yourself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (affected accent) So then I am going to-- (normal voice) Where's my damn eights? Okay, here they are. God damn it! Nine, ten, 11--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's okay, we love you!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 11 plus one lightning damage, because I suck!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then four for Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're an amazing person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, both arrows (impact sound). It tumbles forward, kind of like falls to one knee for a second, and is still picking up and running. So that finishes your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was nine swears in one turn, that was good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was it? Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, really? (yells)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill him!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (yells)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill him! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do a burpee off the floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Easy enough for you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take off running through the doorway!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five, ten, 15-- 30, 35, 40, 45, 50-- You can just get within melee range-- (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kill him, Grog!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- because crazy barbarian speed. You also reveal the rest of the chamber--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please don't be any more people in there! Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see two of the-- This chamber contains a bunch of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A bunch of, looks like cells of some kind, that are locked off with doors, and two of the lemures, the weird fleshy tortured spirit things kind of lie in the corner that all of a sudden see you as you charge in and just pay attention to your appearance. So, what are you going to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I see him, and I say: hi. And I rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Is this your bonus action?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. And I'm going to hit him twice!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reckless, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (Grog voice) That is death!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. Nine-- Wait, there it is. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 points of damage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because that was a one. 20-- 31.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jesus-- 11-- 23. 23 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you rush forward, slam once into the back of his shoulder, he kind of falls to one knee again, still wounded by the slashing to his thighs and the arrows out of his back. The wings kind of unfurl a bit, and he turns around, looking like he's about to point his finger towards you--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- there's like a flash in the eye, like it's attempting to have some sort of type of-- but before it does, you bring the hammer down onto his face. Whack! And as it does, it just caves inward, and falls to the ground, unmoving.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was hot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (whispers) Drag him back in here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Metal Gear Solid this shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I don't have anything else to do. That was it-- my bonus action already.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That may be the end of the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Taryon's turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh! Nope, not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will cast Haste on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I will then start moving. Where am I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're right here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go-- I guess the direction Grog went?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So that's five, ten, 15, 20--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Following your partner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30, 35, 40. You get all the way into this room, you still have 20 feet of movement left, as you enter next to Grog and see two of the fleshy masses of tortured souls kind of starting to make their way in the direction of you and Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do I have left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you cast Haste, and then did your movement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. I'll just pull out my rod, grip it hard, choke down on it, maybe grip it with my left hand so it feels different-- (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'll say, lance! And I'll just use the rest of my movement to just charge at somebody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You run up towards one of these creatures, and as you get closer, as you see it becomes more and more apparent in your vision, the more horrifying it gets as you get closer. What's Doty going to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As I took off I just said, "Doty, on me!" So he's coming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doty's movement is--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like "on me" better than "roll out!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey! Hey. Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doty has to spend half of-- it's difficult to get through the doorway-- and gets about that far. Doty actually pushes Vax out of the way, it has to bend down and get into this central chamber. Doty can use the rest of the movement to get into the room with you. Doty can get right there, and that's all Doty can do this turn. All righty, that brings us to Keyleth's turn.

lines.text: Staying back?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: DM, I have no sense of where I am, because of New Jersey. Where am I on that map?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're in the back of the pack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're the back of the pack-- well, middle of the pack right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I meant to sneak ahead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can maybe Tary gives us one entrance and then we use the actual entrance as well--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I keep going, down the hallway?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- so we're all not going into one entrance? Flank a motherfucker?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, first and foremost--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't have a chance to peek inside any of those doors, did I? Peek in through the window of any of those doors, did I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can if you want to, but you'll stay behind everyone for a little bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Over the earring: If he knows we're here, then all bets are off, but if he doesn't know we're here, I'm going to be able to lay a massive amount of hurt on him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think he knows we're here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tary was screaming like a woman.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I-- There's nothing wrong with that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Number one, there isn't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Women are powerful, and amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was just very high-pitched, is what I mean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, and there's nothing wrong with that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Except it gives away our position in this endeavour.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But did you see? I slew that-- slew? Slayed? Is slew a past tense of slay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Slew.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Do I have any way of knowing if this is Utugash in the next room? Can I do a wisdom check with my bear smell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, make a perception check, with advantage because of your keen senses.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bear smell!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Take that first one. Okay--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As Tova does this, I turn to her--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- and I say, you won't pee on me will you? I've already been marked.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Peed on before.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Why would you ask that? What kind of stuff do you guys do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I ask that of everyone I meet.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Who are you people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what did you roll for your check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It isn't a door that's closed--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's no door? It's just open?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no door, it's just an open wall that leads into a chamber.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I want to kill that guy so bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taryon, you're leading the charge, you said?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like Tary, you should make a door on the other side and then we go inside.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On the other side? We were there already.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, I mean where Doty is standing right now, if you made a door right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why would that give us any advantage? I'm making a door five feet away from the other door?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that door's around where Doty is standing, is around the corner.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Since I'm the closest, can I step up into the doorway and see what I see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you step up and move. As you do, I need you to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This could be door number two over here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I see.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That way we're all not crowding through one door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, Grog's going into the room right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. As you step forward, something beneath your foot (click), and you look up just as you-- as a piece of a circular stone opening that you previously didn't see before, suddenly pours a heavy amount of extremely hot, boiling oil down above you, and you step back, just out of the way as it splatters across the ground, sizzling there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god. Dexterity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have advantage on that? Because of my thing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! I had advantage already, but that's cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he doesn't get saving throws, he gets skills from you, but he has advantage on saving throws from traps.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Still cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I see anything through the doorway, from where I'm standing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You step forward, make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, this'll be good. Oh! Hey, 18!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, as you turn around the corner and look in, the interior is very low-lit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do have Darkvision.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Upon this chair, you see, similar to what you battled in the City of Brass, you see a massive pit fiend, the wings lazily uncurled to each side, the corpulent mass of it is just this giant belly that hangs over the front of its knees. It clutches to its side, and it's using currently to keep one of its arms propped up, is a large axe, and the other hand is just resting on the side of the throne, and you see it just sitting there, tapping its fingers, looking straight at you as you enter-- as you step into the middle of the hallway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, it's like an invitation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a series of-- clusters of bones throughout the entire room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my lord!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It looks like a happy little robot from up top.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now that I see him, can I look to my left, down the rest of the hallway?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, and it leads to what looks to be a portcullis gate, an iron gate of cross bars that has-- is closed currently yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cool cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no, to the left of the doorway but still in the hallway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say, it's 10:45. Do we want to pick up at this battle moment at the beginning of next week?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, all right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If Noelle is available.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Are you available next week?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I don't know, are you going to leave me tied to a table?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You'll start with us!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could've found you in a magical shop.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could've found you in a prison.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Could've been drinking in a bar, like a normal person, but no, tied to a chair.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Just an extra night of torture, it's no big deal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just an hour and 40 minutes to sign a contract.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Take your time! I'll be around, I want to kill this guy.

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so we'll have Noelle back for next week. We'll pick up right at the encounter with Utugash, within his stronghold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Uragash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh man, this'll be fun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think I called him U-tu-gash, because that's what I wrote down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Utugash.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like Uta Hagen, but Utugash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: U-T-U-G-A-S-H.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, it is U-T-U, Utugash. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did good, you did good. (laughs) But yeah, we'll pick this up next week, jumping into this fray. Thank you guys so much for watching, thank you so much for playing, guys. Thank you Loot Crate for being our awesome sponsor. And we'll see you guys-- we'll be there at Wondercon this Saturday, 2PM.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, jeez.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah-yeah! Yeah! Two o'clock.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Big room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The arena. All right, folks, have a wonderful night, sleep well and is it Thursday yet? Good night.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Night!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice! [music]
